SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Display
Display holds the data of the displays to show to players.
Display.Builder
Builder class for the Display class.
DisplayCurrents
DisplayCurrents holds the current displays being shown to players, and is necessary to open, close, or get the display.
DisplayLib
The DisplayLib class is required for the API to identify the plugin.
Interactable
Interactable objects can be used to run an action when clicked.
Interactable.Builder
Builder class for the Interactable class.
ItemBuilder
ItemBuilder is meant to return dynamic items that change depending on the context or viewer.
